body_html: You can remove 3.7 - I don't think you use K80's large shared memory anywhere, and code generated for 3.5 should just run on 3.7. I'm also not sure how valuable and/or common 5.0 is. Finally, try adding -Xfatbin -compress-all to compiler args.
body_text: You can remove 3.7 - I don't think you use K80's large shared memory anywhere, and code generated for 3.5 should just run on 3.7. I'm also not sure how valuable and/or common 5.0 is. Finally, try adding -Xfatbin -compress-all to compiler args.
body: You can remove 3.7 - I don't think you use K80's large shared memory anywhere, and code generated for 3.5 should just run on 3.7. I'm also not sure how valuable and/or common 5.0 is. Finally, try adding -Xfatbin -compress-all to compiler args.
